lmoInfo: The LMO Registry provides summary information on all living modified organisms registered in the BCH, including transformation events, genetic modifications and the
lmoLink: (if available) for each record. Links to all decisions and risk assessment reports that refer to these organisms are accessible through the records in the registry.
perform: to perform an in-depth search of all LMO records available in this Registry.
